text: Imagine a compact harvester gliding smoothly across a vast field. Its precise movements a testament to modern engineering. Despite its small size, it skillfully navigates between rows of crops, efficiently harvesting each plant along the way. Built with advanced autonomous technology, this tiny machine requires no operator. It independently handles planting, harvesting, and sorting. This is a glimpse into the future of agriculture where technology enables the smallest machines to achieve great results.
